TitleSelect: Getting to Know Each Other: "20 Bộ câu hỏi & Trả lời | Getting to Know Each Other: Insights into Personal Lives and Preferences"
ListenList: Do you have any pets?
Maria has a cat named Whiskers.
John has no pets but would like to get a dog.
Anna has two birds and a fish tank.
What was the last book you read?
Maria recently read "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen.
John finished reading "The Da Vinci Code" by Dan Brown.
Anna just read "To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee.
Do you like to cook?
Maria loves cooking Italian dishes.
John prefers to eat out rather than cook.
Anna enjoys baking more than cooking.
What's your favorite food?
Maria's favorite food is spaghetti carbonara.
John's favorite food is sushi.
Anna loves eating homemade pizza.
Are you good at cooking/swimming/etc?
Maria is good at cooking and gardening.
John is good at playing basketball and swimming.
Anna is good at painting and playing the piano.
Are you married or single?
Maria is married with two children.
John is single and enjoying his freedom.
Anna is in a relationship but not married.
Do you have brothers and sisters? Are they older or younger than you?
Maria has an older brother and a younger sister.
John has one younger brother.
Anna is an only child.
Do you like baseball?
Maria likes watching baseball but doesn't play.
John enjoys playing and watching baseball.
Anna is not a fan of baseball.
Do you live alone?
Maria lives with her family in a house.
John lives alone in an apartment.
Anna shares an apartment with a friend.
Do you live in a house or an apartment?
Maria lives in a house with a garden.
John lives in a small apartment in the city.
Anna lives in an apartment close to her workplace.
Have you ever lived in another country?
Maria lived in Spain for two years.
John has never lived outside his home country.
Anna spent a year studying abroad in Japan.
Have you ever met a famous person?
Maria once met a famous singer at a concert.
John met a well-known author at a book signing event.
Anna has never met any famous people.
How do you spend your free time?
Maria enjoys reading and gardening in her free time.
John likes to play sports and watch movies.
Anna spends her free time painting and listening to music.
How long have you been studying English?
Maria has been studying English for five years.
John has been learning English since high school.
Anna has been studying English for seven years.
How old are you?
Maria is 32 years old.
John is 25 years old.
Anna is 29 years old.
How tall are you?
Maria is 160 cm tall.
John is 180 cm tall.
Anna is 165 cm tall.
Tell me about a favorite event of your adulthood.
Maria's favorite event was her wedding day.
John's favorite event was his college graduation.
Anna's favorite event was traveling to Europe for the first time.
Tell me about a favorite event of your childhood.
Maria's favorite childhood event was her family trips to the beach.
John's favorite event was winning a school soccer championship.
Anna's favorite memory is celebrating Christmas with her grandparents.
What are your hobbies?
Maria enjoys reading, cooking, and gardening.
John likes playing sports, watching movies, and hiking.
Anna's hobbies include painting, playing the piano, and traveling.
What countries have you visited?
Maria has visited Spain, Italy, and France.
John has only traveled within his home country.
Anna has visited Japan, Germany, and Canada.

seo.Topic: Getting to Know Each Other: Insights into Personal Lives and Preferences

seo.metaTitle: Getting to Know Each Other: "20 Bộ câu hỏi & Trả lời | Getting to Know Each Other: Insights into Personal Lives and Preferences"
seo.metaDescription: Explore personal interests, experiences, and preferences through a series of questions and answers.

contentArray.content: Getting to Know Each Other: Insights into Personal Lives and Preferences
Exploring personal interests, experiences, and preferences through a series of questions and answers.
Discussing hobbies, favorite foods, travel experiences, and more to understand each other better.
Sharing insights into personal lives to build connections and foster understanding.
